item.description: Update Possible Drowning; INC#1168; 05:35PM; 2032 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Gz4HKm; Westlake; LAPD divers are in the water conducting a search. This will now be an LAPD operation only. All LAFD resources are being released. Any questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2662; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E211 EM11 RA13 RA811 T11; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Possible Drowning; INC#1168; 04:35PM; 2032 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Gz4HKm; Westlake; LAFD ambulance was in the area of MacArthur Park and received reports from bystander stating they saw someone enter the lake and not come out. Based on the report, LAFD dispatched a *Drowning* response at 3:51PM and is initiating a search operation. LAPD Divers were requested. This will likely be an extended duration operation. LAPD Inc# 2662 No further details at this time.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E211 EM11 RA13 RA811 T11; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Technical Rescue; INC#0632; 10:57AM; 400 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HToMP0; Downtown; Firefighters established an anchor point using a rope system (as a safety) and then proceeded to retrieve the workers via the window nearest their lift. They are now safely in the building and are not injured. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E10 E203 E210 E227 E9 EM1 HR3 RA209 RA3 RA889 RA9 T10 T27 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue ; INC#0632; 10:19AM; 400 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HToMP0; Downtown; Two workers (no reported injuries) are stuck on a window-washing lift (the rig motor broke) at the 25th floor of the high rise building. Search and Rescue firefighters are consulting with the command staff and building engineer to ensure the workers are safely tethered and determine the course of action to enact a rescue. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E10 E203 E210 E227 E9 EM1 HR3 RA209 RA3 RA889 RA9 T10 T27 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Blueline Train vs Vehicle 12/22/2022 INC#1056

item.description: Update Blueline Train vs Vehicle; INC#1056; 04:12PM; 1688 E Vernon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qnW0tg; Central-Alameda; Firefighters extricated and are transporting one adult female patient in unknown condition. There is one patient additional patient (a pedestrian with an injury secondary to the collision - was not struck by the train) with a minor injury being transported. Track 1 and 2 are shut down and riders are advised to follow @metrolaalerts for updates. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to the appropriate law enforcement agency LAPD Inc# 2752. No further details.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E14 E21 E215 EM11 HR3 RA17 RA21 RA815 SQ21 T15; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Vehicle (Blueline); INC#1056; 03:43PM; 1688 E Vernon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qnW0tg; Central-Alameda; Train versus vehicle. The passenger vehicle sustained significant damage (split in half) and one patient entrapped. Firefighters are imitating an extrication operation while also checking for any injuries on the train.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E14 E21 E215 EM11 HR3 RA21 SQ21 T15; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Deceased Person; INC#0983; 03:04PM; 17981 W Surfview Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FSmXiN; Pacific Palisades; A hiker encountered a deceased person on a trail. Firefighters located the individual and have confirmed death (age / gender unknown at this time). All questions are referred to LAPD West LA Inc#2592 and LA County Coroner for identification and cause of death. No further details.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E23; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic - FATALITY; INC#0760; 01:11PM; 6358 W Forest Lawn Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PLwoos; Griffith Park; The patient requiring extrication is beyond medical help and determined dead on scene. Firefighters are evaluating the second patient for transport. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc 2120 and the LA County Coroner. No further details.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E260 E60 E76 E97 EM14 HR3 RA76 RA86 T60 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Physical Rescue; INC#0760; 12:51PM; 6358 W Forest Lawn Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PLwoos; Griffith Park; Two vehicle collision with two patients. One patient, in critical condition, is trapped and requires extrication. The condition of the second patient is unknown at this time (ages/genders unknown at this time). Questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 2120 All Eastbound traffic on W Forest Lawn is being closed and drivers are advised to use alternate routes.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E260 E60 E76 E97 EM14 HR3 RA76 RA86 T60 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
TEST ONLY; INC#TEST; 09:32AM; TEST ONLY; Margaret Stewart
